bell_schedule.1: School starts at 8:30, Recess is from 10:05 to 10:25 AM, Lunch is from 12 to 12:40 PM. For Kindergarden to 3rd grader, school ends at 2:30 PM. For 4th and 5th graders, school end at 3:00 PM
bell_schedule.2: Early dismissal on Tuesday. School starts at 8:30, Recess is from 10:05 to 10:25 AM, Lunch is from 12 to 12:40 PM. School is dismissed at 1:55 PM
